Articles.Content:
Anykey Skywalker comes to your home and repairs your internet. Nobody cared.

The next poster gets doomed to watch rick-roll on youtube instead of any webpage.
Dodges the cyber attack  next poster gets pasted  by missiles  on my F-16
I shoot down the missiles with 13 MW green lasers, then turn my 8 mm railguns against the next poster.

Oh no... This is going down the rails. Too bad. I hopped on an an ITS and escaped.

Also the terrible pun I made destroys the next poster.

I have pun-proof earplugs.

I feed the next user DHMO

I drink the water (DHMO).

i send a giant rocket to crash into the poster bellow me.

I watch some unknown poster, being hit by a giant rocket, flying away. Poor thing, we even don't know his name...

The next poster is safe. Nothing happens with him. Nothing at all. Never. Not even smallest event.

Still, gilly smashes into the poster above me.

I throw the Hollow universe at the poster below... (http://s1.zetaboards.com/Conceptual_Evolution/topic/8030342/2/#new)

I replace Hollow with Hallow, so it's halloween time!

I send an unstable rocket at the next poster.

It disintegrates before it reaches me, sending the debris flying in another direction.

I use the banhammer on the next poster.

I use cool swag hax to de-ban myself.

I hax the next user xdddd

2 bad 4 u im 2 mlg 4 the haxers.

 

I sic the Grammar Police on the next poster.

Grammar Police reads my posts and runs away, screaming in fear.
Occasionally they hit the next poster by a car.

That sentence doesn't make sense, so it is deleted.

 

I give Jeb a booster and says the next poster wants to be hit by it.

it runs out of fuel and crashes

I have a sith lord mind trick the next poster into getting themselves killed

Your mind tricks won't work on me!

 

My mind trick to kill the next poster work on the next poster.

Your "trick" is illogical. I know what's coming, I focus,  and you  lose.

The next poster gets attacked by a red runaway drone.

Bonus points for knowing what I'm referring to.

Edited October 27, 2016 by TheKosanianMethod
me not no how to spel

I do not get the reference. So I do not get bonus points. But I google it.

*5 minutes later*

I bring more Mighty Mouse rockets.

However, most of them miss and hit the next poster...

I block them with Captain america's shield.

 

I shoot the next poster in the head with a kilometer-tall death machine that shoots 30x10x10 meter osmium rounds at 200 km/s. BOOM!

 

Edited October 28, 2016 by Souper
triggers everywhere

6 hours ago, Souper said:

It's not really a discussion, after all.

Until somebody argues with thesis.

P.S. Not a discussion, but Japan and RF - immigration havens?!... You should study geography a little better.

Right before you pull the trigger, the Kraken comes along and destroys your death machine.

Then the Kraken ruins the next poster's Jool mission that he spent 100 hours on.
The kraken stops, I worship him, he knows that. He decides to attack rhe next poster instead...

... which is immediately stopped by lag on my computer, causing KSP to crash two seconds after a quick save. 

I send a rocket towards a new Earth reentry testing probe, and deflect towards the next poster...

The probe does not survive re-entry.

I drop the world's largest pumpkin on the next poster.

Alas, the pumpkin ablates due to reentry heating. By the time it reaches me it is merely dust, the worst of which just made me sneeze.

 

I invoke a severe peanut allergy on the next player while throwing peanuts at him/her...
